title: ActInf Livestream #038.1 ~ "The evolution of brain architectures for predictive coding and ActInf"
description:
The evolution of brain architectures for predictive coding and active inference
https://royalsocietypublishing.org/doi/full/10.1098/rstb.2020.0531

This video is an introduction for some of the ideas, not a review or final word.
